message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $200. I think you'll find it's worth the price!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I could come down to $180, but I can't go any lower than that. It's a very fair price for what you're getting.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $180, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
